about_the_game:
Explore the artwork from Universe for Sale in this artbook from Tmesis Studios.

A space station nestled in the clouds of Jupiter. A bizarre bazaar where a young, worried woman crafts entire universes in the palm of her hand. A mysterious cultist who's stripped the flesh from his bones in order to reach enlightenment. Here, there's a universe for sale. You buying?
detailed_description:
Explore the artwork from Universe for Sale in this artbook from Tmesis Studios.

A space station nestled in the clouds of Jupiter. A bizarre bazaar where a young, worried woman crafts entire universes in the palm of her hand. A mysterious cultist who's stripped the flesh from his bones in order to reach enlightenment. Here, there's a universe for sale. You buying?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14 or more
  • Processor: Intel Iris Pro 1536mb
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14 or more
  • Processor: AMD Radeon Pro 5300M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB RAM

name: Universe for Sale - Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i-3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics card with more than 2GB of Storage Space.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i-3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics card with more than 2GB of Storage Space.
